description.p: The FloodFX class is an output-only effect that fills its target area with a single colour value.

action.name: Draw
action.comment: Render the effect to the target bitmap.

field.name: Colour
field.comment: The colour of the fill in RGB float format.

description.p: This field defines the colour of the flood fill in floating-point RGBA format, in a range of 0 - 1.0 per component.
The colour is complemented by the Opacity field.

field.name: Opacity
field.comment: Modifies the opacity of the flood colour.

field.name: XMLDef
field.comment: Returns an SVG compliant XML string that describes the effect.
